cancellationPolicy.cancellationDaysDescription: You have to cancel 3 day(s) prior to the service date.
cancellationPolicy.cancellationChargeDescription: Otherwise cancellation charge of Full Charge from Grand total will be applied.

cancellationPolicy.cancellationDaysDescription: You have to cancel 14 day(s) prior to the service date.
cancellationPolicy.cancellationChargeDescription: Otherwise 1 night per room cancellation charge will be applied.

cancellationPolicy.cancellationDaysDescription: You have to cancel 7 day(s) prior to the service date.
cancellationPolicy.cancellationChargeDescription: Otherwise 50 % cancellation charge for the entire stay will be applied.
